parameters.name: UseDefault
parameters.description: True to use the default printer resolution, false to set the printer resolution

title: IPageSetup.SetResolution
description: Sets the current printer resolution on documents and drawing sheets.
signature:
System.Boolean SetResolution( 
   System.Boolean
UseDefault
,
   System.Int32
DPI
)

parameters.name: UseDefault
parameters.description: True to use the default printer resolution, false to set the printer resolution

returns: True if printer resolution is set, false if not
remarks:
Specifying IPageSetup::SetResolution (false, 0) turns on the default resolution, which results in
IPageSetup::GetUseDefaultResolution
returning True.
